results.title: Rabbit on the moon
results.brief_description:
Italians are the largest group of non Anglo Celtic migrants in Australia, totalling nearly one million people. Yet, like most of these migrants, they are either constantly misrepresented or not represented at all on Australian screens.
Australia, 1971. “Rabbit on the moon” is a fairy tale about a northern Italian girl growing up in suburban Australia as seven year old, Italian born Guiseppina (Aurelia Eneide) encounters the painful realisation that she is living in a dual society.

results.title: Peel
results.brief_description: A red-headed family’s drive in the countryside begins an intrigue of awesome belligerence and obstinacy. This short student drama from the director of ‘The Piano’ (2003) was the winner of the Palme d’Or for best short film at Cannes in 1986. Original format 16 mm/colour.

results.title: Mr Ikegami's flight
results.brief_description: Mr Ikegami is in Sydney on business. Back in Tokyo, his wife Seisuko is expecting their first child. A tale of divided loyalties. Features Kazuhiro Muroyama as Mr Ikegami. Japanese/English with English subtitles. Original format 35 mm

results.title: Egg
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Anne Gilhooly and Nicole Mitchell
results.brief_description:
An elderly woman living alone in her suburban family home makes a friend - a fallen bird’s egg she finds in the local park. She takes Egg into her home, and into her heart.
A sensual and evocative film about lonliness, life and love.
Features Paulette Perry as the woman.

results.title: Cutting of materials
results.creator_credit: Peter Riding, Humphrey Barron and BBC
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Approaching Automation”.
This film deals with the cutting of materials, using cutting, milling, drilling, turning. facing and threading machinery. Points out the advantages of pneumatic and electrical equipment over manual labour. Questions the applicability of some methods of cutting in use and sums up the benefits of part and full automation of existing plant.

results.title: Together in the middle of nowhere
results.creator_credit: Rachel Clements, Tony Krawitz and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Vince embarks on an odyssey through the city streets while his girlfriend Jacqui works in a stripclub until dawn. Over one night they journey into the darkness of their own hearts to find out what really matters. Cast includes Mark Priestley as Vince and Hayley McElhinney as Jacqui

results.title: Design for assembly
results.creator_credit: Peter Riding, Humphrey Barron and BBC-TV
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “Approaching Automation”.
Discusses ways of increasing productivity by means of (1) design liaison with production engineers and sales personnel and, (2) low-cost automating techniques for small and medium batch assembly lines. Industrialists, engineers and consultants are interviewed to show the lessons that can be learned from their experiences.
